name: Dear Alchemist
description:
Plot

After traveling the Wold with his two Companions, the Alchhemist settled down and now leads a life in Research and Relexation.

Untill he recieves a message from one of them asking for help to save their home.

Controls

Keyboard:

Walking [W] [A]  [S] [D]

Camera Mouse

Interact [E]

Menu: [ESC]

Controller:

Walking (Left Stick)

Camera (Right Stick)

Interact (A)

Back (B)

Menu (START)

Credits

Music: Epidemicsounds

A Dance in the Sun - Erik Fernholm

In the Wizards Home-John_Abbot

Streak of Light - Candelion

Technicolor Dreamscape - Franz Gordon

Programming and Design: 

Me with the help of my Friends and Teachers
